name: Acid Rain Weather Machine
description:
This game was made for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam in June 2022. 

Arrange the rain collector to connect the path of the acid rain drops so you can connect those drops with drops of the same color.  Do you're best to earn a high score while correcting humanity's mistakes in the year 20XX.

Controls:

WASD, Arrow keys and Spacebar.
-Menu's can me navigated directionally either using the WASD keys or the arrow keys.
-Press space to confirm menu selections.
-use A and D as well as the right and left arrow keys to orient the weather machine.

All of the Code, Art and Music in this game was made during the jam.
